origins.title: Data from multiple sources
origins.description: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) dataset is the primary collection of data tracking progress towards the SDG indicators, compiled from officially-recognized international sources.
origins.producer: International Organization for Migration, United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs and OECD as partner agency
origins.citationFull: International Organization for Migration, United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs and OECD as partner agency via UN SDG Indicators Database (https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/dataportal), UN Department of Economic and Social Affairs (accessed 2024).
